thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Whiting Petroleum Qtrly Loss ‍Per Diluted Share $8.80​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Whiting Petroleum Qtrly Loss ‍Per Diluted Share $8.80​
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Whiting Petroleum Corp:
* QTRLY ADJUSTED DILUTED SHARE LOSS $0.17​ * ORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS
* ‍Q4 2017 AVERAGE PRODUCTION AT HIGH END OF GUIDANCE; INCREASES 12% FROM Q3 2017​
* QTRLY ‍TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $474.4 MILLION VERSUS $342.7 MILLION​
* ‍IN 2018, CO PLANS TO SPEND $750 MILLION AS PART OF CAPITAL PLAN FORECAST TO GENERATE AVERAGE ANNUAL PRODUCTION OF 128,400 BOE/D​
* ‍SEES FY 2018 PRODUCTION IN RANGE OF 46.5 - 47.2​ MMBOE
* SEES Q1 ‍PRODUCTION 11.1 MMBOE - 11.6 MMBOE​
* QTRLY LOSS ‍PER DILUTED SHARE $8.80​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
